channel.title: Curious
channel.description:
Curious, how would i go about uploading a cache to my Webhost ?
Like dropbox you copy the public link bla bla.
But, when i upload to File Manager, i cant seem to find anything.
any Tips.?

item.title: Curious
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“extinct2255, post:3, topic:383648”]-.-

Already have done, but i dont know how to get the public link so it auto downloads from my webhost for my webclient …[/quote]

Well, make it into a RAR/ZIP file then give it the link?

If it’s a webhost it’s layed out like:

/Public_Html/yourthings/

You sound like you’re talking about a free file host, not an actual webhost?

Read full topic

@Tom wrote:

“Upload”?

If not, use a FTP client.
